title: So Reddit had one of those, "Delete a Champion" threads

embed.description: r/leagueoflegends does not currently support the reddit redesign. Please go to your preferences, scroll to the bottom, and uncheck "use redesign as my default experience" to view this subreddit correctly.

body:
https://i.imgur.com/w5pOP57.png

https://i.imgur.com/bU225e4.png

https://i.imgur.com/MhJRQ2w.png


{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}} {{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}} {{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}} 

This is just a small sample of over 2700 comments.

Never in my life did I ever think for a second that Riot could do something so bad that even fucking Reddit of all places could almost unanimously hate it. Congratulations.
